portfolioItems.title: Complex Endodontic Procedures
portfolioItems.description: I specialise in complex endodontic procedures, including root canal treatments and retreatement. Through these complex procedures, I demonstrated my precision in managing challenging root canal anatomies, retreatments, and microsurgical techniques. Each case showcases how I preserve natural teeth through minimally invasive approaches and evidence-based protocols.

portfolioItems.title: Advanced Restorative Techniques
portfolioItems.description: I specialise in advanced restorative techniques, including dental implants and full mouth rehabilitation. Using state-of-the-art materials and techniques, each case demonstrates comprehensive treatment planning and meticulous execution to achieve optimal functional and aesthetic outcomes.

portfolioItems.title: Minimally Invasive Dental Treatments
portfolioItems.description: I specialise in minimally invasive dentistry, including tooth-saving techniques and conservative restorative options. These cases demonstrate how modern dental techniques can preserve natural tooth structure while achieving excellent functional and aesthetic results.
